Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
Ball The ball class allows you to create ball objects for the game brickbreaker
Brick the brick class allows you to create individual brick objects for brickbreaker
Game the game class extends JComponent and allows you to create a game object that will run gameplay for brickbreaker the game will continue to run until it has been closed, you will start with 4 (0,1,2,3) lives and if the lives go below 0 the game will reset itself and run again if you clear all of the bricks you will recieve one more life and a new board will be drawn, your score will keep being counted as long as you dont lose all your lives 1 round = 3200 points or one clear of the entire board in order to control the paddle you use the mouse, if the paddle does not appear to be centered with the x coordinate of the mouse pointer then restart the game and make sure your mouse is over the game window while it begins
GameViewer The GameViewer class allows you to start playing the brickbreaker game
GuiFrame The GuiFrame class extends the jframe class, it initializes a game object to start the game as well and also contains the action listener class for animating the ball
Paddle Write a description of class Paddle here.
